channel.title: MYB

item.title: Emerging Non-Volatile Memories Seek Economies Of Scale
item.description: New non-volatile memory report projects that baseline industry revenues could rise to 71.7B by 2034 and displace SRAM, NOR flash and some DRAM.

item.description: It didn’t take long for Jesse "Bam" Rodriguez to destroy Pedro Guevara and to defend his IBF super flyweight title on Saturday night in Philadelphia.
